LanguageData.MakeEMFWGrub.label: forage for grubs
LanguageData.MakeEMFWGrub.description: Gently recover a live featherwing grub from the enclosure. They eat wood and can be harvested for their silk.
LanguageData.MakeEMFWCocoon.label: recover cocoon
LanguageData.MakeEMFWCocoon.description: Recover useable material from the discarded cocoons of featherwing grubs.
LanguageData.MakeEMFWSilk.label: make cocoon silk
LanguageData.MakeEMFWRope.label: make cocoon rope
LanguageData.MakeEMSpiderMask.label: make megascarab mask
LanguageData.MakeEMSpiderMask.description: Craft a terrifying megascarab mask out of cocoon silk.
